message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90%, you take 10%.  We can talk more if you think this isn't fair.
You took 90% last round, now it's my turn to be more generous. Let's meet in the middle.
Let's split it evenly this time. It's a fair deal, and we can both get a decent amount.
You're offering an even split, but I think I can do better. I'll take a bit more, but not too much.
